dashboard.description: Docker  and Aqua monitoring with prometheus , cAdvisor and PostgreSQL

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  agents_connected
FROM
  aqua_monitor
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp) and testname=$testname

targets.expr:
SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  agents_disconnected
FROM
  aqua_monitor
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp) and testname=$testname
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  agents_disconnected
FROM
  aqua_monitor
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp) and testname=$testname

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  scanners_online
FROM
  aqua_monitor
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp) and testname=$testname

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  scanq_spm
  from
  aqua_monitor
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp) and testname=$testname

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  scanq_spmps
  from
  aqua_monitor
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp) and testname=$testname

SELECT
  $__time(timestamp),
  scanq_pending,scanq_progress,scanq_finished,scanq_failed,scanners_online,agents_connected,scanq_spm,scanq_spmps
  from
  aqua_monitor
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp) and testname=$testname

SELECT
  $__time(time_stamp),
  resp_time
  from
  (SELECT no_enforcers,
          no_images,
   		  gateway_calls,
   	      gateway_bytes,
          TIMESTAMP AS time_stamp,
          agent_log,
          agent_log AS log_statement,
          extract(epoch
          FROM TIMESTAMP) - lag(extract(epoch
          FROM TIMESTAMP)) OVER (
         ORDER BY TIMESTAMP) AS resp_time
   FROM rtt_testing) AS BABU
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_stamp) and log_statement='host.echo.replay'

SELECT
  $__time(time_stamp),
  resp_time
  from
  (SELECT no_enforcers,
          no_images,
   		  gateway_calls,
   	      gateway_bytes,
          TIMESTAMP AS time_stamp,
          agent_log,
          agent_log AS log_statement,
          extract(epoch
          FROM TIMESTAMP) - lag(extract(epoch
          FROM TIMESTAMP)) OVER (
         ORDER BY TIMESTAMP) AS resp_time
   FROM rtt_testing ) AS BABU
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_stamp) and log_statement='host.echo.replay'

list.name: testname
list.query: select testname from aqua_monitor order by timestamp desc;

dashboard.title: AquaScale Monitor
